oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lindsley Hall, Nashville, Tennessee, 1978 May
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exterior view of Lindsley Hall, located at 730 2nd Avenue South, Nashville, Tennessee, circa May 1978. This gray stone building is located behind the Old Howard School Building on Richard Fulton Campus. Historic Lindsley Hall was once a part of the old University of Nashville. The building became a Metropolitan Nashville and Davidson County government office building. Forms part of the Claynita Harris Slide Collection. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lindsley Hall (Nashville, Tenn.)
